item.title: Has Qgo Finance Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Qgo Finance Ltd has declared a 1% dividend, amounting to 0.1 per share, with an ex-date of February 20, 2026. While recent returns have been negative, the company has shown significant growth over the long term, particularly a total return of 154.41% over the past 5 years. Time: Feb 10 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has Suprajit Engineering Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Suprajit Engineering Ltd has declared a dividend of 150% (₹1.75 per share) with an ex-date of February 13, 2026. The total returns over various periods show a positive trend, especially in the long term. Time: Feb 10 2026 11:30 PM IST
